Name: Puzzle Fever
About the game: Endless fun for puzzle lovers that will keep you entertained for more than one hour! Fill the playing field with a variety of Tetris-style figures and set new score records. Seems like it's simple? But it was not there! Think over each move so as not to fall into the trap, and in case of a mistake you will be given only 10 seconds to fix it or you will lose! Make combos and collect points - what record will you manage to conquer? Peculiarities: - Nice graphics - Unusual Puzzle - Nice soundtrack
